name: Heart Clash
description:
"What does it take for a peaceful date?

Our Pink Hero, Scarlet, just wants to have a happy date with her favorite engineer, Patty but with Municipal drones going haywire and a jealous teammate on the rise... Scarlet just can't catch a break!

Platform your way through the cityscape to stop the enemies and get back in time for dessert!"

Credits:

  1.  PixiTales - game designer, CG/pixel artist, main coder, Sound effects assistant
  2. Joshlynn - game designer assistant, coder
  3. Bomara - coder assistant
  4. Lytesander/Lyte - music composer, sound effects, and story writer,
  5. UnstableReactor - character designer and art assistant
